participant_1.background:
My most difficult job was cutting down a large tree that had fallen on a power line.
I'm not sure if my parents would approve of my ballet dancing, but I love it!
i don t talk a lot.
I am an actor, but I am currently on a break from working and am enjoying my time with my family in a small mountain town.
I will be enjoying my time off with my family and friends.

participant_2.background:
My beard is a part of my personality, and I love antiques.
I hide my drawings of ponies from my parents because I am afraid they will think they are childish.
i have an eyebrown piercing.
i m a cat person.
I value my Louis Vuittons the most because they're a symbol of my success and status.

content.text: Hello there! How are you today?
Doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
Doing well, thank you! I like your beard.
Thank you! I love antiques, do you like them too?
Yes, I do! I have a few antiques in my home.
That's great! I have a few pieces of antique furniture in my home as well.
I love old things. They have so much history.
I agree! They do. I have a few antique books that I love to read.
That's so cool! I have a few antique books as well. I love to read them.
What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read classic literature. I also love to read books about history.
I love classic literature too! I also love to read books about history.
That's great! We should talk about books sometime.
Great! Let's exchange numbers and we can talk more about books later.
